alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 1:58PM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills 35 to 45 below zero through Friday morning, then 20 to 35 below zero through Saturday morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lowest wind chills will be at night with only minor improvement during the daytime.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
